description: relief carving; red with black ground; one side has image of two Chinese scholars on the bank of a river, looking at a building on the opposite shore; other side has image of seated scholar with attendant boy holding a cup and saucer; orange and white agate ojime; blue cord
medium: Carved cinnabar lacquer (tsuishu); ojime: agate; silk cord
title: Four-case carved lacquer (tsuishu) inro decorated with Chinese scholars; agate ojime
